title: The Regular

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At Night, If You Carry Out the Faction Kill, Duplicate it Onto a Secondary Target. (CD: 2)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection Immune
- If Alive Day 5, the Outlaws Gain a Singular, Factional, Lynchproof Vest. This Must be Activated and is Lost Even if no Outlaw is Lynched When it is Used.

desc:
Post 5485
*A bar regular, but you'll regret overlooking them.*
